Middle School

Developing Reasoning Skills - Classes VI to VIII

Classes VI - VIII

Developing Reasoning Skills

The middle school curriculum focuses on developing thinking and reasoning skills. We maintain a perfect balance between basics, skills, and knowledge to encourage independent thinking.

Key Features

1

Developing Reasoning Skills

Focus on developing thinking and reasoning skills through analytical approach

2

Balance in Learning

Perfect balance between basics, skills, and knowledge for holistic development

3

Arts & Culture Exposure

Regular exposure to arts, culture, and physical activity beyond academics

4

CCE Pattern

Co-curricular activities following Continuous and Comprehensive Evaluation guidelines
